title: "Welcome — your robot will seat you now"
excerpt: "The music and lighting at your table are calibrated to your specifications — again, thanks to the app — and the meal for your family of four is prepared by an automated system so complex and perfectly engineered that there are rumors NASA is looking to implement the technology in an upcoming mission to Mars."
